description:
AJKK-27 EMBROIDERED TWISTED SILK 3 PCS

By Pcs: 3 Pcs Shirt: Twisted Silk Trouser: Twisted Silk Dupatta: Chiffon Color: Green

Emerge from the emerald embrace of the forest, a vision blooming with the essence of nature's timeless beauty in this dark green ensemble. The intricately embroidered shirt is adorned with dual-toned antique gold zari, shimmering like sunlight dappling through leaves. Scattered gold cupped sequins, like fireflies dancing in the twilight, add a touch of ethereal magic. Paired with an airy dupatta, a wisp of green echoing the ensemble's theme, this outfit is not just celebratory attire, but a serenade sung by the wilderness itself.
DESIGN DETAILS:

Embroidered center panel on twisted silk
Embroidered left panel on twisted silk
Embroidered right panel on twisted silk
30'' embroidered border for front daman on twisted silk
30'' embroidered back with border on twisted silk
Pair of embroidered sleeves with border on twisted silk
2.5 meter embroidered border for front & back chaak on twisted silk
2.5 meter embroidered dupatta on chiffon with 2 side borders
1.5 meter dyed wide width twisted silk for trouser
